title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When importing a new image called 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the image is not refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
EB: After importing a new image called 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the new image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Import a new image called 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
2. Check that the original image is still displayed.
3. Import the same 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
4. Observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the new image.
